sub_title: Senior Account Manager Film & TV at Road Rebel Global
summary: Experienced Account and Project Manager within the Entertainment sector. Skilled in Travel Management, Client Retention and Sales.

profile_positions.description:
- Identifying and Developing strategic potential business opportunities. 
- Enhance organisations reputation.
- Expertise in the film industry, film hierarchy, tax incentive markets and film production timeline. 
- Develop trusted advisor relationships with clients.
- Working closely with operations team and operations management to deliver on clients expectations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Procurement of travel and logistics services, project management and contract management/ negotiations for film/tv industry and international live entertainment tours.
- Responsible for many major Hollywood and British film productions involving A-list talent and crew 
(shooting in UK or European tax incentive markets).
- Build vendor relationships, extensive knowledge of the travel industry
profile_positions.title: Housing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Finding a place to call home is key to your success as an Expat. We are expats. We know what it’s like to move to a new country, and settle into a new life. We’ve fallen off our bikes, learned the lingo and discovered Amsterdam’s hidden treasures, putting us in a great position to give newcomers the advice they need to settle in. With our support, setting up in a new city is an exciting and enjoyable experience. 

Our dedicated group of expert expats can help people moving to Amsterdam find a home and settle in. With access to a multitude of platforms, we help expats find their most suitable home here in Amsterdam. We also help them settle in to the city, so they can experience all the great things Amsterdam has to offer.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Shape Careers is an Architecture & Design recruitment agency in London with an in depth knowledge base and relevant experience regarding our industry. We are all passionate about creative design and recognise talented architectural professionals.

We strive to find and meet the best designers to ensure that the design and construction industry is presented with the most talented of candidates for their positions.

We recruit for 

•	Architects 
•	BIM
•	Landscape Architecture 
•	Urban Design
•	Creative Support
profile_positions.title: Creative Support Recruitment Consultant for Architecture & Creative Industries at Shape Careers

profile_positions.description:
Deadgood Ltd | London  				October 2014 – Current
Operations and Production Manager  
Deadgood is a British award winning furniture and lighting design studio, with main business focus in the Architecture and Design community, supplying furniture for contracts including; BMW, Google, BBC, Hospitals, Hotels and large scale work environments.  

•	Project management 
•	Managing the production process, outsourcing to British suppliers and manufactures.
•	Working out the human and material resources needed 
•	Outline timescales for jobs and drawing up production schedules, making sure that products are produced on time and are of high quality.
•	Ensuring production is cost effective, and manage all supplier purchasing
•	Liaising among different departments, e.g. suppliers, managers, designers and clients.
•	Manage international shipping, understanding customs, duties, taxes and insurance to grow international business. 
•	Working alongside company directors to realize the company's goals and policies.
profile_positions.title: Production and Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
I worked with Bailey Studio on a Part Time Freelance basis. 
Bailey Studio is a small interior design Studio that focuses in residential interior design, property staging, plus linen & textiles.

Interior Designer – Residential 
•	Photoshop mood boards for client presentations 
•	Editorial layouts, Every Month we designed an easy accessible home “Look” for an online publication.
•	Specifying furniture and lighting for residential Interior Design, Keeping to a client budget.
profile_positions.title: Interior Designer (part time)

profile_positions.description:
Space Furniture is the largest and most progressive dealer of contemporary design in Australia and South-East Asia.

•	Consult direct with B2B trade clients, which included some of Melbourne’s largest architecture & interior design firms, as well as retail customers and direct clients’ within the showroom, 
•	Understanding each client’s individual requirements, and producing solutions that meet client specifications.
•	Responsible for meeting and exceeding challenging monthly sales targets, both individually and as a team. Individual targets to surpass would range between $50,000-$100,000 depending on month.
•	Achieved highest sales figures amongst the team for my time with Space.
•	Attend and assist with client deliveries.
•	Responsible for all client billings.
•	Brand specialist, making sure all samples, catalogues and materials are up to date.
profile_positions.title: Design Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Coco Republic is a multifaceted design company, business included Retail stores, Design Schools, Interior Design and Property Styling. 

•	Account management, looking after and maintain communications between client and designers.  
•	Coordinate and oversee a wide variety of administrative tasks, Help with daily operations of company and general office support.
•	Prepare Photoshop presentation to a high standard, to communicate concepts and assist with closing deals.
•	Served as the primary point of operational and administrative contact for internal and external parties.
•	Managed and coordinate accounting activities and prepares internal reports for management.
•	Assisting stylist with furniture purchases and client bookings.
profile_positions.title: Property styling coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Vital  Hospitality is a recruitment agency in the field of temporary hospitality staffing solutions.

•	Maintain staffing operations across the board and supervisor of 100 plus staff
•	Creating job descriptions, reviewing resumes and identifying qualified applicants
•	Scheduling interviews
•	Organizing appropriate job placements, and retaining valuable employees
•	Meeting with and maintaining close relationships with clients;  high end hotels, resorts and catering companies
•	Weekly payroll.
•	SAGE accounting software for billing clients.
•	Recognize individual strengths, and reward and promote staff when applicable
profile_positions.title: Staffing Manager
